gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
The game starts, resolution is wrong. Movies are displayed correctly, in game graphics are displayed correctly too, runs smoothly. 

A workaround for the wrong resolution bug is adding the launch option -windowed from Steam.
title: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
